item.title: PNG fix for IE
item.author: contact@khal.web.id (Khalid Adisendjaja)
item.description: Thanks to Angus Turnbull who made this fix and made PNG image looks good on IE, these are two files that you need to implement, iepngfix.htc iepngfix_tilebg.js Usage Include iepngfix.htc on your css style file <pre name="code" class="css" > *html img, *html #anydivid { behavior: url(style/iepngfix.htc); border:0; padding:0; } </pre> include this iepngfix_tilebg.js on you html header, it’s support transparent image on background position and repeat. More complete detail … you can check his website http://www.
